org.apache.spark.util.logging

Class FileAppender

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.util.logging.FileAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RollingFileAppender

    public class FileAppender
extends Object
implements Logging
    Continuously appends the data from an input stream into the given file.
